text: WRLV (1140 AM) was a radio station broadcasting an oldies format. Established in 1979, the station was licensed to serve Salyersville, Kentucky, United States. WRLV was owned by Morgan County Industries, Inc. WRLV surrendered its license on April 11, 2017. ==References== ==External links== *FCC History Cards for WRLV RLV Category:Defunct radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1979 Category:1979 establishments in Kentucky Category:Radio stations disestablished in 2017 Category:2017 disestablishments in Kentucky Category:Magoffin County, Kentucky RLV RLV
title: WRLV (AM)
